thread.title: BRIEF-Citic Bank Signs Agreement With HNA Group With Credit Line Worth 20 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Citic Bank Signs Agreement With HNA Group With Credit Line Worth 20 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: hna group with credit line worth 20 bln yuan

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Citic Bank Corp Ltd:
* SAYS SIGNS STRATEGIC AGREEMENT WITH HNA GROUP PROVIDING CREDIT LINE OF WORTH 20 BILLION YUAN ($3.18 billion)
* SAYS THE COOPERATION WILL HELP HNA GROUP IN STRATEGIC TRANSFORMATION, DEVELOPMENT OF HAINAN AIRLINES
* SAYS IT IS CONFIDENT OF HNA GROUPâ€˜S FUTURE Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2961 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
